title: Track Your Employees
description: A Command-line application to keep track of a company where users can add, delete, and update all parts of a company.

title: The Hungry Monkey
description: An app where a user can search for recipes or restaurants by a specific food they enter in the search bar.

title: Sticklers Paradise
description: An open sourced app to house game rules. Users can create an account and login to add games, or anyone can view or search games.

title: README Generator
description: A Node.js application to automatically generate a README.md file, using the Github API for users profile image.

title: Feed the Frog a Burger
description: A simple app demonstatrating the use of Handlebars, you one can add burgers and 'devour' or 'regurgitate' them.

title: Employee Directory
description: A simple React app demonstrating the use of sorting and searching through a table of random user data.
